Package controllers

Class GameRunner

  • Object
    • controllers.GameRunner
  • public class GameRunner
extends Object
    Controls the Game Loop. Handles other actions.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      (package private) static class  GameRunner.Phases
      This is an enum that maintains the current phase in the turn.

      • validatePlayerCount

        public static boolean validatePlayerCount​(ArrayList<String> playerNames)
        Validates the count of players in the game.
        Parameters:
        playerNames - a list of names of every player
        Returns:
        A boolean with success or failure.

      • updatePlayerIndex

        public static void updatePlayerIndex()
        Updates the current player index (round robin fashion)

      • getCurrentPlayer

        public static Player getCurrentPlayer()
        A getter for the current player object.
        Returns:
        Player object, for the player whose turn it is.

      • gamePlayer

        public static void gamePlayer​(ArrayList<String> commands)
        This processes the addplayer command.
        Parameters:
        commands - an arraylist of options

      • gameSetup

        public void gameSetup()
        Game Setup -- handles the Setup phase. All the Setup phase commands and army distribution logic is here.

      • checkGameReady

        private boolean checkGameReady()
        Checks if the setup is complete and the game is ready to begin
        Returns:
        true if numberOfArmies for each player is 0 ; else returns false

      • placeArmy

        private boolean placeArmy​(String countryName)
        This method places an army in a country that the player owns
        Parameters:
        countryName - name of the country to place an army
        Returns:
        A boolean with success or failure.

      • placeArmy

        private boolean placeArmy​(String countryName,
                          int numArmies)
        This method places an army in a country that the player owns
        Parameters:
        countryName - name of the country to place an army
        numArmies - armies to place
        Returns:
        A boolean with success or failure.

      • DFSCheckAdjacency

        private Set<String> DFSCheckAdjacency​(Set<String> visited,
                                      String fromCountry,
                                      Map<String,​Set<String>> mapByOwnershipByCurrPlayer)
        A recursively implemented utility function to perform a DFS on the modified map (only player owned countries in adjacency)
        Parameters:
        visited - a set of visited neighbor countries
        fromCountry - country from which Depth-first traversal starts
        mapByOwnershipByCurrPlayer - a map that is relevant to the current player alone
        Returns:
        visited the set of visited countries during the depth-first traversal starting from fromCountry

      • checkIfPathExists

        private boolean checkIfPathExists​(String fromCountry,
                                  String toCountry)
        It verifies if the fortify move is possible by checking whether there is a path between from and to countries
        Parameters:
        fromCountry - the country from which armies are transferred
        toCountry - the country to which armies are to be transferred
        Returns:
        true if such a path exist; false if it doesn't exist

      • gameLoop

        public void gameLoop()
        The Game Loop method: handles all the logic for processing turns. Reading and executing commands for REINFORCE, ATTACK (TODO), and FORTIFY phases.

      • populateCountries

        public Map<String,​Country> populateCountries​(ArrayList<Player> playerList)
        This method randomly populates all the countries on the map.
        Parameters:
        playerList - list of players in the game
        Returns:
        a map of countries with ownership
